title: I just want everything to run smoothly on this device not have any bugs and not be hacked please
content: I just want to be able to send photos from my Google photos to people on my contacts on the regular phone numbers. Also I want everything to run smoothly I don't want no bugs I don't want no hackers please I just want to use a phone simply use it and get the best quality I can out of it for as long as I can thank you
